51824.「ホホホ。女神の天桜石は\n 無事 光の河に捧げられたようじゃな。:
Hohoho...the Pink Goddess Gem has been safely
offered to the River of Light.

51825.「さて 無心で 女神に祈るのじゃ。:
Now, pray to the Goddess with an unwavering
heart.

51827.どこからともなく 声が 聞こえてくる。: A voice can be heard echoing from afar...

51829.<center>永き時を経て 異界の地で\n魔瘴のチカラを その身に宿せし魔族が:
After many years, in the foreign world, a demon appeared who harbored the power of the demon miasma within their body.
They came to be called the Demon King.

51830.<center>魔の王のチカラは 六聖陣をも圧倒し\nついに 聖戦に敗れる時が来:
The Demon King's power overwhelmed even the
Six Saints, their defeat nearly upon them.

51831.<center>六聖陣は かろうじて 逃げのびたが\nこの敗北は 地上への魔瘴の:
The Saints managed to escape, but their defeat
ultimately lead to the invasion of miasma on
the surface world.

51832.<center>もはや 六聖陣と その従者だけでは\nアストルティアを守ることの:
Indeed...the time has come where the Six
Saints and their followers alone are not
capable of protecting Astoltia.
